name: Ituran Location and Control Ltd.
description: Ituran Location and Control Ltd. is a leading provider of innovative location-based services and advanced telematics solutions. Founded in 1995 and headquartered in Israel, Ituran specializes in vehicle tracking, stolen vehicle recovery, and fleet management systems. The company aims to enhance vehicle security, improve operational efficiency, and provide peace of mind to its customers through its advanced technology and comprehensive service offerings. Ituran's proprietary systems utilize state-of-the-art GPS technology and cellular communication to deliver real-time data and insights to vehicle owners and fleet operators. With a commitment to innovation, Ituran has expanded its services to include insurance telematics and usage-based insurance solutions, allowing insurers to assess risks more accurately and offer personalized policies. The company's solutions are widely adopted in various industries, including automotive, logistics, and transportation. Ituran has established a strong presence in multiple markets across the globe, providing services to both individual customers and businesses. With a focus on customer satisfaction and continuous improvement, Ituran remains at the forefront of the telematics industry, driving advancements that enhance safety, efficiency, and connectivity for its clients.
